column4: Old Frankfort Pike just inside New Circle Rd
column5: Both lanes are shut down due to a fluid spill.  Inbound Old Frankfort Pike traffic is being diverted to New Circle Rd.
Single vehicle prior to the southern split.

column5: The right lane is blocked.  Old Harrodsburg Rd reportedly remains shut down.

column4: Outbound Tates Creek Rd between Saron Dr and Federal Dr
column5: One lane remains blocked due to repairs on a damaged gas line.  Use added caution in this area.
